name: some basic roguelike game, but you can pick a side... and dash
name_original: some basic roguelike game, but you can pick a side... and dash
description:
Enjoy the game about dashing into the enemies to destroy them!

..And picking a.. Side. Yeah. Pick your main skill and the room you will go to in this amazing "rogue-like" game!

This game was made for the GeoJam 2022.

Controls:
WASD/Arrows - Move the player!
LMB - Dash!

Music: "Just Breathing - Instrumental" by Neffex:
